name: Vandan Enterprises
overview:
Since establishment in the year 2011, Glamour Battery has gained recognition as a reputable Traders , supplier and distributor of a comprehensive range of Industrial, Stand-by Power, Motive Power, Solar and Electric Vehicle Batteries. Our long and extensive experience in the industry has helped us develop the best sources for quality materials required for the manufacture of our products.

Our Team: Engineers Technicians Quality controllers Research associates Warehousing experts Sales and marketing personnel Skilled and unskilled labor

Infrastructure: Backed by a state-of-the-art and world class infrastructure, which comprises of different units as in designing, manufacturing, R&D, warehousing and packaging. Moreover, these units are imbibed with the latest technology and advanced amenities, in order to manufacture and deliver a flawless range of products to our clients.

Quality Assurance: We have always been a quality driven organization, engaged in offering a comprehensive range of Batteries to our clients at industry leading prices. For this purpose, our professionals make sure to exercise supreme quality raw material in manufacturing these products, in strict compliance with international quality standards.

Client Satisfaction: Being a patron-centric firm, we have always emphasized to maximize the contentment level of our clients by serving them a quality-assured range of Batteries. For this, our experts manufacture these products using high-grade quality raw material, which is procured from reliable vendors of the industry, in tandem with international quality standards.
